>
[Metuak's Pendant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1525)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 81</row>

**Price** 155 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This black quartz pendant carved in the shape of an [angel's](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=3) feather hangs from a leather cord worn around the neck. Once worn by Metuak of the Burning Mammoths, this family heirloom anchors you to your ancestors, preserving your sense of self and protecting your mind from mental manipulation and demonic possession. You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects that would make you [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6), [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37). This bonus increases to +2 if the source of the effect is a [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70).
